data.name: Destined to Die - TV Cutscene Raw Art
data.detailed_description:
This includes:
1000+ raw pictures of the woodblock prints that are converted into the TV Cutscenes.
*Warning you will need 6GB of space*

Right click the product in your Steam Library and select "Properties".
Under the "Local Files" tab, select “Browse Local Files”.
Within the product's local files, locate a folder that has a similar name to the content you are searching for.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
